predicate.note: Frames file for 'copy' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 25.2 and 25.4, Framenet entry Duplication.

example.name: transitive
example.text: When test booklets were passed out 48 hours ahead of time, she says she copied questions in the social studies section and gave the answers to students.
example.arg: questions in the social studies section

example.name: with copy
example.text: John accidentally copied to Mary his steamy suggestive love letters.

roleset.name: make a copy, don't mention copy

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: I have a right to print those scripts if I go there and laboriously -- but no longer surreptitiously -- copy them out in long hand .
